程序包 Controller

类 BudgetManagementController

java.lang.Object
Controller.BudgetManagementController
public class BudgetManagementController extends Object
Manages budget-related operations for the finance management system, including loading budget data, saving custom budgets, and clearing custom budgets. Interacts with the BudgetManagementPanel for UI updates and the BudgetService for data processing.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Group 19

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private final BudgetService
    budgetService
    Service for handling budget data operations.
    private final String
    username
    Username of the current user.
    private final BudgetManagementPanel
    view
    Budget management panel for displaying UI components.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    BudgetManagementController(String username, BudgetManagementPanel view, BudgetService budgetService)
    Constructs a BudgetManagementController with the specified username, view, and budget service.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    clearCustomBudget()
    Clears the custom budget for the current user, reverting to the system-recommended budget.
    void
    loadBudgetData()
    Loads budget data for the current user and updates the view asynchronously.
    void

    Saves a custom budget amount for the current user after validating the input.

  • 字段详细资料

    • username

      private final String username
      Username of the current user.

    • view

      private final BudgetManagementPanel view
      Budget management panel for displaying UI components.

    • budgetService

      private final BudgetService budgetService
      Service for handling budget data operations.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • BudgetManagementController

      public BudgetManagementController(String username, BudgetManagementPanel view, BudgetService budgetService)
      Constructs a BudgetManagementController with the specified username, view, and budget service. Loads budget data if the view is initialized.
      参数:
      username - the username of the current user
      view - the budget management panel for UI interaction
      budgetService - the service for budget data operations

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadBudgetData

      public void loadBudgetData()
      Loads budget data for the current user and updates the view asynchronously. Displays a loading state during data retrieval and handles errors if data loading fails.

    • saveCustomBudget

      public void saveCustomBudget(String budgetInput)
      Saves a custom budget amount for the current user after validating the input. Updates the view with the new budget and reloads budget data.
      参数:
      budgetInput - the budget amount as a string

    • clearCustomBudget

      public void clearCustomBudget()
      Clears the custom budget for the current user, reverting to the system-recommended budget. Updates the view and reloads budget data.
